title: Another Day, Another Dell Laptop Being Practically Given Away for 73% Off at Amazon (32GB RAM, 1TB SSD)
description: Save over $1,500 on this fully loaded 15.6-inch touchscreen Inspiron, with a free 8-in-1 USB-C hub thrown in, all for just $649.
content:
Just when we thought we had seen the last of the crazy clearance deals on high-end laptops at Amazon, another one drops just in time for Back to School shopping. This time it’s a Dell Inspiron with a 15.6 inch full-HD touchscreen, 13th Gen Intel i5 processor, 32GB of RAM, 1 TB of storage, and even an 8-in-1 USB-C hub thrown in free just in case you’re still holding out, all for just $649. The 73% price slash brings this bundle down from a list price of $2,399.

This is another chance to score a premium laptop packed with features and performance for a fraction of its normal price. It’s a perfect laptop for college or high school students preparing to return to class in the next few weeks, or for a home-office professional, small business owner, or anyone who just wants a mega-powerful laptop from one of the world’s top manufacturers.

The Dell Inspiron’s Intel Core i5-1334U processor has 10 cores and 12 threads, able to hit speeds of up to 4.6GHz, and virtually begging to be put to the test with as much multitasking as you can throw at it. Videoconferencing, spreadsheets, emailing, streaming, or just routine everyday surfing could theoretically all take place at the same time if you had more hands and eyeballs.

This laptop can hold as much as 64GB of RAM, and it comes with 32GB built in to aid in that multitasking or any other job you put the Inspiron to work on. There’s a more than ample 1TB PCIe NVMe solid-state drive too, so you won’t be at risk of running out of space or having your work grind to a halt with “your disk drive is nearly full” pop-up messages. Of course, if you want more storage, or a dedicated portable drive for backups, the 8-in-1 expansion hub that’s included in this Amazon bundle can handle a USB drive, 4K monitor via HDMI, SD card, and more.

The big 15.6-inch display is a great touchscreen, but it’s also a full-HD beauty with anti-glare finish and narrow borders, and it’s backed by an Intel Iris Xe Graphics card so all of your visuals from multimedia presentations to Zoom calls to movie and TV streaming come through smoothly, with no lag. Your internet signal isn’t going to let you down either — the Dell Inspiron comes with Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth so you’re always connected.

This 2025 model Dell Inspiron laptop is loaded with every possible modern tech feature, so you won’t need to consider any upgrades for years to come. It’s ready and waiting for you in this Amazon bundle with a free 8-in-1 USB-C hub for 73% off then $2,399 list price — just $649 while this limited-time deal is in effect.
summary: A Dell Inspiron laptop with a 15.6 inch full-HD touchscreen, 13th Gen Intel i5 processor, 32GB of RAM, 1 TB of storage, and even an 8-in-1 USB-C hub are being given away for 73% off from their list price of $2,399. This deal is part of a larger trend of high-end laptops being discounted at Amazon for Back to School shopping. The Inspiron’s Intel Core i5-1334U processor has 10 cores and 12 threads, capable of reaching speeds of up to 4.6GHz, and can handle multitasking. The laptop can also hold up to 64GB and is backed by an Intel Iris Xe Graphics card. It comes with Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth so you're always connected.
shortSummary: Dell Inspiron, featuring a full-HD touchscreen, 32GB RAM, 1TB storage, and an 8-in- USB-C hub, is available for 73% at Amazon.
argos_summary: Amazon is offering a significant discount on a Dell Inspiron laptop, featuring a 15.6-inch full-HD touchscreen, 13th Gen Intel i5 processor, 32GB of RAM, and 1TB of storage, now priced at $649, down from $2,399. This deal is ideal for students and professionals alike, providing ample performance for multitasking and everyday tasks. The laptop includes modern features such as Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth, and an 8-in-1 USB-C hub, making it a comprehensive package for anyone in need of a powerful device.
